intro: In this visual novel you will meet Lila, a young explorer, and Max, her loyal monkey friend, who embark on a great adventure guided by a mysterious map.
description:
Adventure in the Jungle!

Discover a world of magic, mystery and friendship in this interactive book for children.

What begins as a simple expedition soon becomes a great adventure full of riddles, dangers and amazing discoveries. But the jungle holds secrets, and only those with a brave heart will be able to discover them.

Get ready for an unforgettable story!

Features of the interactive book:

· Explore a magical jungle full of surprises through vibrant illustrations.

· Meet charming characters and mysterious creatures.

· Accompany Max, the most mischievous and loyal monkey.

· Meet Rico, a clever toucan with mysterious intentions.

· Learn values such as friendship, respect for nature and teamwork.

· An interactive story full of magicDiscover the secrets of the jungle with Lila and Max and find the true treasure: a special message that will change their way of seeing the world.

·Ideal for kids and families who love stories full of adventure, learning, and fun!

·Colorful illustrations and a charming styleThe jungle comes to life with adorable characters and vibrant settings in an unforgettable visual experience.

·Easy to enjoy and suitable for all ages

With a simple and interactive narrative, this book is perfect for young children who want to explore and enjoy a great story.

Adventure awaits! Are you ready to discover the secrets of the jungle?
